## ALGO Leverage
```{r}
dat = gen_dat(500)
x = dat[[1]]
y = dat[[2]]
algo_leverage(x, y, r=20, subsample='lev')
```

## Elastic Net Coordinate Descent

```{r}
dat = gen_elnet_data(50)
X = dat[[1]]
y = dat[[2]]

beta = elnet_coord(X, y, alpha=1, lambda = 1, n_iters = 100)
print(beta)
```
